keyword: how many calories in chicken wings
title: How Many Calories in Chicken Wings?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in chicken wings for a typical serving of 6, plus protein, fat, carbs, and nutrition tweaks for different preparations.
h1: How Many Calories in Chicken Wings?
assumptions: Bone-in, with skin, roasted; medium size (~52 g per wing with skin); no added sauce, breading, or salt.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, brand, and additions like sauce or breading. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 6 roasted chicken wings provides ~594 kcal and ~51 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add buffalo sauce (1 tbsp per wing)

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one roasted chicken wing with skin.

faqs.q: How many calories in chicken wings with sauce?
faqs.a: Sauce adds ~50 kcal per wing; 6 sauced wings â‰ˆ894 kcal.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 wings provide ~51 g protein, mostly from the meat.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in chicken wings?
faqs.a: 6 roasted wings have ~42 g total fat, including 12 g saturated.

faqs.q: Do fried chicken wings have more calories than baked?
faqs.a: Yes, frying adds ~30 kcal per wing due to oil absorption.
